name: Contessa
description: [Photo: Jessica Leibowitz] Mojitos and mint juleps are wonderful warm-weather drinks. But sometimes a late-spring or early-summer day requires a drink with a bit of an edge, a spark bright enough to match the waning light of a late sunset....

recipeInstructions.text: The Contessa is comfortable in two variations: for the first, simply combine the ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice; stir well for 20 seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. For the second variation, stir with ice as above and strain into a rocks or old fashioned glass filled with fresh ice. Either way, be sure to twist a piece of orange peel over the drink and use as garnish.
